tossup_question: 10) PHYSICS  What is a perfectly black body?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) A body that has emitted all its light
X) A body which has zero co-efficient of linear expansion
Y) A body that absorbs all the radiations incident on it
Z) A body not within reach of any source of light
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) A body that absorbs all the radiations incident on it
bonus_question: 10) PHYSICS  What is the absorptive power of a perfectly black body?
